response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This exceptional piece holds immense value to us, but we believe it could be even more impactful in your hands. We are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. This opportunity not only presents a significant saving for you but also aligns with our goal of finding the right owner who can truly appreciate and utilize the product's capabilities to their fullest potential.", "product_price": 750000}
